DOC.brief_summary: The purpose cluster-randomized trial examine whether daily consumption β-carotene biofortified maize flour reduce prevalence vitamin A deficiency improve vitamin A status among 4-8 year old child rural Zambia .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy β-carotene Biofortified Maize Reducing Vitamin A Deficiency Among Children
DOC.detailed_description: Vitamin A deficiency major public health problem Zambia , affect approximately 40 % young child . We aim conduct cluster-randomised control trial Mkushi region rural Zambia test whether feed child two daily meal contain β-carotene biofortified maize flour compare regular white maize flour-based meal six month reduce prevalence vitamin A deficiency improve vitamin A status among 4-8 year old child . Five hundred child arm receive 2 meal day , 6 day week 6 month , change serum retinol concentration compare . An additional arm 250 child , enrol randomly sample cluster , receive maize flour intervention concurrently follow order evaluate overall effect maize flour feed scheme measure household food security .
